org.processmining.plugins.interactivevisualization

Class InteractivityContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.processmining.plugins.interactivevisualization.InteractivityContext

  • public class InteractivityContext
extends java.lang.Object
    The Interactivity Context can be used by visualizations implementing the InteractiveVisualization interface for storing and further communication. This context stores the reference to the InteractivityManager managing this visualization, among others.
    Author:
    Danny van Heumen

      Methods

      InteractivityManager getManager()
      Get the current interactivity manager.

        public void setManager(InteractivityManager manager)

      • getManager

        public InteractivityManager getManager()
        Get the current interactivity manager. (Or 'null' if it has not been registered yet.)
        Returns:
        Returns the current interactivity manager or 'null' if no InteractivityManager has been set.
